common_0130_rival_01:

hang\r
of\r
how\r
to\r

Pokémon OK?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0130_rival_02: Let me see. So far you’ve caught—[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0130_rival_04:
I’ve never heard that kind of cry before! Could
be some strong Pokémon or something![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0130_rival_05:
I say we find whatever made that cry! Let’s take a
look around, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!\c
Just be careful—there’s a kinda unsafe cave not
far from here, so steer clear!\c
And I know your Rotom Phone can help keep you
safe, but watch your step by these cliffs anyway![VAR 0114(0004)]
